description:
Domon has Rain go scope out the situation with Schwarz/Kyoji while he goes to the Battle Royale. Rain sneaks in as a doctor and discovers that Schwarz is an android made up of DG cells. Rain`s father also finds out since he`s an expert in cybernetics.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Royal Kaishi! Fukkatsu no Devil Gundam
Battle Royale Begins! Dark Gundam Revived
Das Battle Royale beginnt! Der Devil Gundam ist zurück
La mêlée générale commence ! La résurrection du Devil Gundam
バトルロイヤル開始! 復活のデビルガンダム
